histogram.name: VideoTutorials.LanguagePicker.Action
histogram.summary: Recorded whenever the user interacts with the video player language picker UI. Records various user actions such as language selection, back press, or dismiss actions.

histogram.name: VideoTutorials.LanguagePicker.LanguageSelected
histogram.summary: Recorded whenever the user taps on a language in the video player language picker UI. Only the position of the language in the list of available languages will be recorded.

histogram.name: VideoTutorials.Player.LoadTimeLatency
histogram.summary: Records the latency in bringing up the video player for video tutorials. Measures the time difference between user clicking on a video to the time when it actually starts playing.

histogram.name: VideoTutorials.{Feature}.Player.Progress
histogram.summary: Records video watch progress events such as play, pause, resume, completion, failure etc. encountered during when watching video tutorial for the {Feature} feature.

histogram.name: VideoTutorials.{Feature}.Player.UserAction
histogram.summary: Records user actions on the video player UI, such as clicking on various buttons, encountered when watching video tutorial for the {Feature} feature.
